system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.WZgKEHaJW8emVPBl]{Personal Firearms Proficiency}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.pTE8c8BZNlsYPWTN]{Handgun Specialist}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.PjWBnexrl6cy31Qc]{Handgun Reloader}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.mwsYkls3YGpYe3WO]{Skilled Pistol Magazine User}

Benefits

When firing a holdout, backup, full-size, or target handgun that uses magazines or has an internal magazine, or machine pistol, the Combat Point cost is 2 less. When clearing a jammed holdout, backup, full-size, or target handgun that uses magazines, or machine pistol, the Combat Point cost is 9 less. When attempting to repair a holdout, backup, full-size, or target handgun that uses magazines, or a machine pistol, the character receives a +6 bonus. Also, a character receives +1 damage dice when performing a double tap attack with any semi-automatic holdout, backup, full-size, or target handgun that uses magazines. Also, a character receives +2 damage dice when performing an autofire, burst fire, sprayfire, or sweepfire attack with a machine pistol.
system.summary: -2 CP, +1 double damage die, +2 autofire damage die
